name: Giant Shark
description: The Giant Shark is an enormous predator known for its immense size, razor-sharp teeth, and powerful jaws. Typically found in deep ocean waters, it has a sleek, hydrodynamic body designed for speed in pursuit of prey.
memorable: The shark can detect blood from miles away, making it an unyielding hunter of injured creatures.
goals: To hunt and consume any prey that crosses its path, including ships and large sea creatures.
relations: Often encountered alongside other sea creatures, and poses a threat to adventurers who venture into its territory.
strengths: Exceptional strength and constitution, allowing it to deal significant damage and endure attacks in combat.
weaknesses: Inability to breathe out of water limits it to underwater engagements.
attacks: Can execute a multiattack with powerful bite and tail attacks, dealing substantial damage with each hit.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy grants it advantage on melee attacks against wounded foes, making it particularly dangerous when prey is hurt.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures and objects without light, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
skills: Has notable Perception skills, aiding it in noticing threats and prey.
additional_information: Water Breathing ability restricts it to aquatic environments.
Blood Sense allows it to track wounded creatures within 120 feet.
Swift Hunter ability lets it close gaps quickly in combat.
Electricity sensitivity may incapacitate it temporarily when hit by lightning.
High damage output potential through multi-attacks.
test_queries: shark found in the ocean that hunts injured prey
relentless underwater hunter with sharp teeth
aggressive aquatic beast with blood sense
giant sea creature that attacks ships
